field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item above.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them above.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution above. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes above.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases above.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item above.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box above.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Embargo lift date
field.hint: (Optional) If applicable, enter the date the embargo will be lifted.

field.label: One: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item above.

field.label: Author
field.hint:
Enter your name above. We encourage you to provide your middle name and date of birth to help us distinguish you from others with a similar name.
Preferred form: Last Name, First Name Middle Name/Initial Suffix, Date of Birth
(e.g., Last Name box: Smith First Name box: James John Jr., 1984-)
field.required: You must enter your name in the author field.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the title of your thesis/dissertation above.
field.required: You must enter a title for this item.

field.label: Date of Graduation
field.hint: Select the month and year of your graduation above.
field.required: You must select a graduation date.

field.label: Publication Type
field.hint: Select Thesis, Dissertation, or Report above.
field.required: You must select a publication type.

field.label: Degree Name
field.hint: Enter your degree above. Example: Computer Engineering
field.required: You must enter a degree name.

field.label: Degree Level
field.hint: Select your degree level above.
field.required: You must select a degree level.

field.label: Department
field.hint: Enter the department which is granting this degree above.
field.required: You must select a department.

field.label: Major Professor
field.hint: Enter your thesis advisor(s) above.
field.required: You must enter an advisor.

field.label: Committee Member(s)
field.hint: Enter your thesis committee member(s) above.
field.required: You must enter at least one committee member

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the main language of the item above.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter keywords for your thesis/dissertation above.
field.required: You must enter subject keywords for your work.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the text of your abstract above. Do not include the heading "Abstract".
field.required: You must enter an abstract.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: (Optional) Enter the names of agencies, if any, that helped to fund your research above. Do not use acronyms or abbreviations. If you did not have a source of funding for your research, leave this space blank.

field.label: Embargo lift date
field.hint: (Optional) If applicable, enter the date the embargo will be lifted.

field.label: Author
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item.
field.required: You must enter the name of at least one author to continue.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the title of the item below.
field.required: You must enter the title of the item to continue.

field.label: Image Filename
field.hint: Enter a name/title for this image.

field.label: Date Issued/Created
field.hint: Enter the date this item was photographed or published.
field.required: You must enter the item's Date Issued.

field.label: Image Acquisition Data
field.hint: Example: Image Type: SEM Image, Scale Bar: 2um, Image Date: 3/13/1998, Magnification: 27000, Etch: No Etching, Coating: Au Pd..

field.label: Sampling Site
field.hint: Example: Cave: Holeinground, State: NM, Country: U.S.A.
field.required: You must enter Sampling Site information.

field.label: Type of Cave
field.hint: Choose the type of cave in which this image was taken.

field.label: Keywords/Search Terms
field.hint: Please enter general descriptive keywords below.

field.label: Sample Type
field.hint: Example: Sample Type: FMD.
field.required: You must enter a Sample Type.

field.label: Speleothem, Sample Color
field.hint: Example: Speleothem: FMD, Sample Color: blue.

field.label: Related Images
field.hint: Enter information regarding related images

field.label: Related EDX Images
field.hint: Enter information regarding related EDX images

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases above.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item above.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box above.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Available at
field.hint: A URL for this item, if it is located outside of LoboVault.

field.label: Embargo lift date
field.hint: (Optional) If applicable, enter the date the embargo will be lifted.
